definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be slight, swift, trifling (prob. orig. be light; NH [[[קָלַל]]], [[קַל]], [[קִלֵּל]]=BH; As ḳalâlu II. depise, dishonour; so Tel Am (appar. Canaanism); Ar. qal=a be small, scanty; Sab. [[קללם]] scanty Ha1:143.8f. (cf. Fell:ZMG liv (1900), 246); Eth. qalala be light, Small, easy; II. despise; Targam [[קְלַל]], Syr. qal = BH ; also (v.

definitions.title: Pilp
definitions.body: ., etc.) Ar. qalqala shake, qelqel:: vibrate, whirl (of sword), qalqala: v. be shaken;—Schwally:ZAW xi (1891), 170 ff. thinks shake original, v. [[מַקֵּל]]);—†
be slight, of water, be abated, fr off ([[מֵעַל]]) earth Ge 8:8, Ge 8:11(J).
be swift, c. [[מִן]] comp., of warriors 2Sa 1:23, horses Je 4:13, Hb Hab 1:8; one’s days Job 7:6, Job 9:25.
trifling, i.e. of little account., of pers., Ge 16:4, Ge 16:5 (J; both c. [[בְּעֵינֶיהָ]]; 1Sa 2:30 (opp. [[אֲכַבֵּד]]). †
shew oneself swift Is 30:16 (‖[[עַל־קַל]] [[נִרְכָָּב]]).

appear trifling, 1Sa 18:23 ([[בְּעֵינֵיכֶם]]; Inf. subj., cf. Dr), c. [[מִן]] comp. be too trifling Is 49:6, esp. of sin 1Ki 16:31 (Inf. subj.), and (c. [[מִן]] comp.) Ez Eze 8:17; easy 2Ki 3:18 ([[בְּעֵנַי]]), 2Ki 20:10 (c. Inf.), Pr 14:6; Pt. (as subst.) c. [[עַל]] in adv. phr.[[עַל־נְקַלָּה]] lightly i.e. superficially, Je 6:14, Je 8:11.
be lightly esteemed 2Sa 6:22 (‖[[שָׁפָל ]]; opp. [[אִכָּכֵָדָה]]).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf.) 3 ms. [[יְקֻלָָּל]] Is 65:20 be cursed by death ; 3 fs. [[תְּקֻלַּל]] Job 24:18 their portion is cursed; Pt. pl. sf. [[מְקֻלָּלָיו]] Ps 37:22= those cursed by him (opp.[[מְברָכָיו]]). †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הֵקַל]] Is 8:23; 2 ms. sf. [[הֱקִםלּחַנִי]] 2Sa 19:44 (van d.H. [[הֲ]]-); 3pl.[[הֵקַלּוּ]] Ez Eze 22:7; Impf. 3ms. [[יׇקֵל]] 1Sa 6:5; Imv. ms; [[הָקֵל]] Ex 18:22+; Inf. cstr. id., Is 23:9, Jon 1:5; —

make light, lighten, [[יׇקֵל אֶת־יׇדוֹ מֵעֲלֵיכֶם]] 1Sa 6:5; he will lighten his hand from upon you; c,. [[מֵעַל]] pers. alone, make light from upon one, lighten one’s burden Ex 18:22 (E), Jon 1:5, 1Ki 12:10 = 2Ch 10:10; + [[מִן]] partit. 1Ki 12:4, 1Ki 12:9 = 2Ch 10:4, 2Ch 10:9.
treat with contempt, acc. pers. 2Sa 19:44, Is 23:9, Ez Eze 22:7; dir. cams. bring contempt, dishonour Is 8:23 (opp. [[הִכְבִּיד]]). †

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms.
shake [[קִלְקַל בַּחצִּים]] Ez Eze 21:26 (in divination).
(peculiarly) whet Ec 10:10 (prop. move quickly to and fro). †
